TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DSAKeyValue extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

Docs.summary: 表示 元素的 私钥。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>类表示 `<KeyInfo>` 元素，该元素包含一个 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> 公钥。
使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> 标识与 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> 用于创建数字签名的私钥相对应的公钥。
如果没有向构造函数显式提供密钥，则将随机生成一个新的 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> 密钥对。
<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue>类与 XML 签名一起使用。 有关 W3C 规范的详细信息，请参阅[XML 签名语法和处理版本 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> XML 加密中的类来创建分离签名。
[!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CPP/exampledetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CS/exampledetached.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/VB/exampledetached.vb#1)]
下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> XML 加密中的类创建信封签名。
[!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CPP/exampleenvelope.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CS/exampleenvelope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/VB/exampleenvelope.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: 用新的、随机生成的 公钥初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新密钥时 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> ，此构造函数使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> 由类定义的的默认实现 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.DSA key) cil managed

Docs.param: 包含公钥的 类的实现的实例。
Docs.summary: 用指定的 公钥初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue> 在 XML 加密中使用类。
[!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CPP/exampledetached.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CS/exampledetached.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/VB/exampledetached.vb#2)]
[!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CPP/exampleenvelope.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CS/exampleenvelope.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/VB/exampleenvelope.vb#2)]
